					Become a writer and make your academic excellence work for you

					We are always looking for first-class academic minds to join us.

									

			

		

	



	
		
			Could you be an Oxbridge Essays academic?

		

	

	
		
			If you haven't gathered already, our services work by connecting leading academic mentors, who have a passion for helping others learn, with students who are in need of additional support with their studies. We work hard to source the most elite academics, ensuring their credentials meet our rigorous standards.

Many of our academics find the opportunities we present appealing since the hours and place of work are determined entirely by them. You can decide how much work to take on, and choose projects that appeal to your skillset or interests. You can complete projects alongside your normal job or commitments, or make this a full-time career on which you focus all your efforts and time.

If you're a first-class academic with an interest in helping students and essay writing, we'd love to hear from you. We're always looking for exceptional new writers and talented researchers across all subject areas. 

While most of our academics are Oxford or Cambridge graduates, we do consider strong applicants from other leading universities, particularly those with a subject specialism not taught at Oxford or Cambridge.

			Learn more and apply

			
To streamline the application process, we encourage you to visit Academic Minds, our writer-focused site. There you can learn more about writing for us, register your interest and find out how the application process works.



			https://www.academicminds.co.uk

Become a writer and make your academic excellence work for you

We are always looking for first-class academic minds to join us.

Could you be an Oxbridge Essays academic?

If you haven't gathered already, our services work by connecting leading academic mentors, who have a passion for helping others learn, with students who are in need of additional support with their studies. We work hard to source the most elite academics, ensuring their credentials meet our rigorous standards.

Many of our academics find the opportunities we present appealing since the hours and place of work are determined entirely by them. You can decide how much work to take on, and choose projects that appeal to your skillset or interests. You can complete projects alongside your normal job or commitments, or make this a full-time career on which you focus all your efforts and time.

If you're a first-class academic with an interest in helping students and essay writing, we'd love to hear from you. We're always looking for exceptional new writers and talented researchers across all subject areas.

While most of our academics are Oxford or Cambridge graduates, we do consider strong applicants from other leading universities, particularly those with a subject specialism not taught at Oxford or Cambridge.

Learn more and apply

To streamline the application process, we encourage you to visit Academic Minds, our writer-focused site. There you can learn more about writing for us, register your interest and find out how the application process works.

https://www.academicminds.co.uk
